flawed_nl_solution:
The bakery has made 300 total doughnuts / 10 doughnuts per box = <<300/10=30>>30 boxes of doughnuts.
So at the end of the day, they still have 30 total boxes of doughnuts - 27 sold boxes of doughnuts = <<30-27=5>>5 boxes of doughnuts leftover.
They are therefore giving away 5 boxes of doughnuts * 10 doughnuts per box = <<5*10=50>>50 doughnuts.
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
